dc_title_s: Bacon's motor road map, England & Wales : showing roads, distances and railways
dc_description_s: Cover title.; Title in upper centre: Bacon's motoring map of England & Wales.; Insets: On north sheet: [Northumberland, Cumberland and Durham]; on south sheet: Continuation west of Cornwall.|136 x194 Centimeters, on sheet 77 x 102 Centimeters|Scale [1:506,880]. 8 miles to 1 inch|General Map Collection
